text: exceptions to prior authorizations when prior authorizations are required under a health benefit plan the authorization shall be valid for months from the date the health care provider requests the prior authorization additional medically necessary services or procedures required during an otherwise authorized service or services shall not be denied or require additional authorization iii all notifications and disclosures of prior authorization requirements and written notices of new or amended requirements shall be provided to all impacted health care providers days prior to the effective date nothing in this section shall be construed to require coverage for services that have been prior authorized if the health plan coverage is not effective on the date of service standards for patient transfers a health benefit plan shall respond to a request for a patient transfer within one business day when a health benefit plan has determined a lower level of care at a health care facility is clinically appropriate the health benefit plan shall not require a prior authorization for medically necessary interfacility transport to the receiving health care facility when a health benefit plan has determined a lower level of care at a health care facility is clinically appropriate and does not provide accommodations to ensure the necessary transportation to the receiving facility the health benefit plan shall reimburse the originating facility not less than the daily contracted reimbursement rate
